Personal Profile:
I am an enthusiastic, self-motivated and methodical person. I am outgoing, tactful, and able
to listen effectively when solving problems. I have a creative mind and am always up for
new challenges. I am willing to learn and easily adapt to changes. Working in
MAYBANHANG.NET while it was being restructured, I had chance to participate in building
ISA department.
